text: Maria Manuel Leitão Marques (born 23 August 1952) is a Portuguese politician of the Socialist Party who has been serving as Member of the European Parliament since 2019. She previously served as Minister of the Premiership and of Administrative Modernisation . From 2015 until 2019, she represented the Viseu constituency in the Assembly of the Republic. Marques was the Secretary of State for the Administrative Modernization under the XVIII and XVII Constitutional Government of Portugal. In the 2019 European elections, Leitão Marques ran on the list of Prime Minister António Costa's Socialist Party.Maïa de La Baume and Lili Bayer (May 15, 2019), The 14 women who could take over the EU Politico Europe. She has since been serving as vice chair of the Committee on the Internal Market and Consumer Protection. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:Living people Category:Government ministers of Portugal Category:Women government ministers of Portugal Category:Socialist Party (Portugal) politicians Category:MEPs for Portugal 2019–2024
title: Maria Manuel Leitão Marques
